pullRequest.title: Add toggle to remove spellbook tooltips
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #8634
Adding a config option to disable spell book tooltips.

commit.message: Add toggle to remove spellbook tooltips

nodes.bodyText: This is a really confusing method name as it is opposite the actual behavior of the method.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -52,4 +52,15 @@ default boolean chatboxTooltip()
 	{
 		return true;
 	}
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+			position = 2,
+			keyName = "spellbookTooltip",
+			name = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips",
+			description = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips so they don't cover descriptions"
+	)
+	default boolean spellbookTooltip()

nodes.bodyText:
Reduce indents by one level.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			position = 2,
          
          
            
            			keyName = "spellbookTooltip",
          
          
            
            			name = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips",
          
          
            
            			description = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips so they don't cover descriptions"
          
          
            
            		position = 2,
          
          
            
            		keyName = "spellbookTooltip",
          
          
            
            		name = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips",
          
          
            
            		description = "Disable Spellbook Tooltips so they don't cover descriptions"

commit.message: Refactoring method name to reduce confusion
